1. Virtual Card is not a real physical card, but it has all the same functions / capabilities as a regular MAXX COFFEE World Card. 
2. You could only use your Virtual Card using Android / iOS Mobile Application. 
3. You could top-up your Virtual Card Balance 
4. You could collect Beans
Please take a moment to rate and write a review about MAXX COFFEE World App.Your review matters to us.
